name: PORTABELLO PANIC! Demoroni
description:
Papa Paisano was in his kitchen late one fateful night, working on a fantastic mushroom dish, when he accidentally awoke the long dormant deity of delicacies: The Portabelloverlord! Now, trapped in a food-based world, Papa Paisano will have to jump, climb, and stomp his way through hoards of enemies in order to stop The Portabelloverlord in this platforming adventure! Made for Webster University's Intro To Game Dev Class!

Controls:
WASD - Movement
Space - Jump
You can hang on ledges!
